alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 8:52AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fayette, Coweta and south central Fulton Counties through 915 AM EST... At 852 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Handy, or near Newnan, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, Fayetteville, Peachtree City, Union City, Fairburn, Tyrone, Palmetto, Senoia, Brooks, Moreland, Sharpsburg, Turin, Woolsey, East Newnan, Starrs Mill, Arnco-Sargent, Handy, Cannongate, Sandy Creek and Lake Horton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
